Key Match Events: Mexico equalize in 11th minute of stoppage time
Honduras earn two red cards in the process
Mexico triumph in penalties to book Copa America spot
Pre-Game Insights: Mexico needed a big result to seal automatic qualification to the Copa America
The team had fallen 2-0 to Honduras in the opener
Post-Match Reflections: Alvarez played hero by firing El Tri's second goal
Bryan Rochez's penalty was stopped by Luis Malagon, giving Mexico the early advantage
Honduras was handed a lifeline when goalkeeper Edrick Menjivar stopped Cesar Huerta not once but twice from the spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Honduras lost their heads and earned two red cards
Mexico have locked up their spot in the Copa America
Mexico will face Panama in the Nations League semifinals during the March international window
